external_id.description: A unique user identifier. Required if `user alias`, `braze_id`, `email`, or `phone` is not provided.

braze_id.description: Identifier reserved for the Braze SDK. Required if `external_id`, `user alias`, `email`, or `phone` is not provided. Not recommended for use with the Snowplow integration.

alias_name.description: The actual value of the alias identifier.

alias_label.description: Indicates the type of alias. E.g. `domain_userid`.

_update_existing_only.description: If `true`, API requests will only update existing user profiles in Braze. `false` recommended.

time.description: Time of the purchase, required. Must be ISO 8601 format.

quantity.description: Quantity of the item purchased. Braze treats this as multiple individual purchases.

app_id.description: Associates activity with a specific app in your Braze workspace. If set, should match a Braze App Identifier, found in Braze console's API section. Can be omitted, but incorrect values may result in data loss in Braze.

properties.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs assigned to the purchase in Braze.
